clauses.title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted
clauses.description: Content may remain in backup servers and be retained after deletion, and thus never be completely deleted. This case doesn't apply to contributions that can't be removed due to the nature of the service.
clauses.clause_text:
On 2024-09-24 08:27:25 UTC, riyasharma (38125)  wrote:
          It takes flawless efforts to have a Call girls in Gurgaon, as you can get experienced Gurgaon Escorts here. You can start your romantic journey with your favourite Gurgaon Call Girls that you select to get infinite sexual pleasure.

case.text: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

clauses.title: Prices and fees may be changed at any time, without notice to you
clauses.description: The service reserves the right to change or modify its pricing and fees at any time, and such changes are effective immediately without need for further notice to the user.
clauses.clause_text: you acknowledge and agree that such fees may change from time to time.

case.text: Prices and fees may be changed at any time, without notice to you

clauses.title: Terms of service can change at any time, but Busuu will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: These Terms of Service may be updated from time to time by Busuu. You can review the most current version of the Terms of Service at any time here: www.busuu.com/terms. Your continued use of the Service or the Site after any such changes have been made constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms of Service.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
clauses.description: User accounts can be terminated for having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly, meaning they cannot be terminated without a reason, but only for a limited number of reasons. Additionally, user accounts will not be deleted after a first infringement.
clauses.clause_text:
Busuu may suspend or terminate your access to and/or use of any one or more Paid Services immediately and without liability if:
9.1. Busuu has reason to believe that you are in breach of or have acted inconsistently with these Paid Services Terms. or
9.2. Busuu is entitled to suspend or terminate your account, or your use of the Service generally, under clause 9 below.

case.text: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

clauses.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text:
You have the right to make a complaint at any time to the Information Commissioner's Office (ICO), the UK supervisory authority for data protection issues.
We would, however, appreciate the chance to deal with your concerns before you approach the ICO, so please contact us in the first instance.

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

clauses.title: You will be notified about website maintenance
clauses.description: Users will be notified before their experience is impacted due to website maintenance.
clauses.clause_text: Notice of any such modification or discontinuance shall be posted on the Site wherever possible.

case.text: You will be notified about website maintenance

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: If you don’t want Busuu to display your User Content anymore, you can delete your account at any time and your information won’t be visible to other users.

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
clauses.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.
clauses.clause_text: non-exclusive licence

case.text: The service has non-exclusive use of your content

clauses.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
clauses.description: The service rejects any responsibility for the contents of other websites to which it links.
clauses.clause_text: Busuu has no responsibility for content on other websites that you may find or access when using the Service.

case.text: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last updated: October 2018

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
clauses.description: You card will be billed on recurring basis unless cancelled. For instance, monthly or annual subscriptions.
clauses.clause_text: Where a subscription-based Paid Service renews automatically, your credit card will be charged automatically at the end of your current subscription period and your subscription will, unless you cancel it, be renewed for the same period of time.

case.text: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

clauses.title: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms
clauses.description: Content infringing the Terms of Service (or the Acceptable Use Policy or equivalent) may be removed, with or without notice.
clauses.clause_text: Busuu shall have the right (but not the obligation) in its sole discretion to refuse, move or delete any User Content that is available via the Service that breaches the Terms of Service or is otherwise (in Busuu's sole discretion) objectionable.<

case.text: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms

clauses.title: Harming minors in any ways is prohibited
clauses.description: This service prohibits harming minor in any ways. Since both “minor” and “in any ways” are vague and can be cited to restrict possibly any actions, the case is not classified as “good”.
clauses.clause_text: 5.2. harm minors in any way;

case.text: Harming minors in any ways is prohibited

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
clauses.clause_text: 3.7. for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or exemplary damages (even if Busuu has been advised of the possibility of such damages), resulting from any matter relating to the Site, the Service or the Content.

case.text: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

clauses.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.
clauses.clause_text: 5.8. upload, post, email, transmit or otherwise make available any unsolicited or unauthorised advertising, promotional materials, "junk mail", "spam", "chain letters", "pyramid schemes", or any other form of solicitation.

case.text: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

clauses.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.
clauses.clause_text: use the Site, the Service, the Content and the Software, in each case for your own personal, non-commercial use,

case.text: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

clauses.title: You must create an account to use this service
clauses.description: You must provide the service with your information in order to use it
clauses.clause_text: <li>In order to use most features of the Service, you must have a valid Busuu account.

case.text: You must create an account to use this service

clauses.title: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
clauses.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.
clauses.clause_text: 5.11. interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers or networks connected to the Service,

case.text: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: the Site, the Service and the Content are provided "AS IS" and that you use the Site, the Service and the Content at your own risk.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text:
In particular, you agree not to use the Service to:
5.1. upload, post, email, transmit or otherwise make available any User Content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, libellous, invasive of another's privacy, hateful, or racially, ethnically or otherwise objectionable.

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons
clauses.clause_text: Busuu has the right to close or cancel the account of any User in the event of any unauthorised or fraudulent use of their account or any Paid Service.

case.text: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text:
You also confirm that you are either at least 18 years old or, if you are younger than 18, that you have the permission of your parent or legal guardian, who will take responsibility for your compliance with these Terms of Service.
The Service is not intended for use by children under the age of 13.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties
clauses.description: In this context third-parties refers to anyone including friends, family, or company
clauses.clause_text:
Each account must be used individually and is not transferable. You agree to:

2.1. use your account individually and not share it with others.

case.text: You cannot distribute or disclose your account to third parties

clauses.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
clauses.description: The service asks the user to notify them immediately of any unauthorized use or security breaches.
clauses.clause_text: 2.2. immediately notify Busuu in writing of any unauthorised use of your password or account or any other breach of security.

case.text: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

clauses.title: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its Terms of Service does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their Terms of Service.
clauses.clause_text: The terms of use of those websites, and not the Terms of Service of Busuu, govern your use of that material.

case.text: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and account, and are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your password or account.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: ensure that you do not violate any applicable local, state, national or international law or any rights of third parties (including trade mark, trade secret, copyright or other proprietary rights).

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: Busuu does not control the User Content posted via the Service and, as such, does not guarantee the accuracy, integrity or quality of such User Content.

Busuu also collects and generates a number of other areas of usage information automatically which includes.
services metadata, log data, device information, IP addresses, third-party data and cookie information.
